SEARCH
Package com.hanggrian.socialview.internal

Class SocialViews

java.lang.Object
com.hanggrian.socialview.internal.SocialViews
All Implemented Interfaces:
SocialView
public final class SocialViews extends Object implements SocialView
Utility class to help implement SocialView on any TextView-based class. This class itself is not a View.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.hanggrian.socialview.SocialView

    SocialView.OnChangedListener, SocialView.OnClickListener

      @NonNull public Pattern getHashtagPattern()
      Description copied from interface: SocialView

    • getHashtagColors

      @NonNull public android.content.res.ColorStateList getHashtagColors()
      Description copied from interface: SocialView

      Specified by:
